title: Strengthening Web Development Practical Competencies: Advanced Cardiovascular Life Support (ACLS) Skill Maintenance Simulation Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic BLS (Basic Life Support) knowledge and intermediate ACLS (Advanced Cardiovascular Life Support) theory
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Perform ≥6 of 8 ACLS core skills at ≥80% accuracy within 120 days post-simulation training
Reduce accurate vasopressor infusion rate calculation time to ≤90 seconds through high-fidelity manikin simulation
Achieve ≥50% manikin survival rate in team-based emergency scenarios

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
